name: SortFix
overview:
SortFix is an Israeli based company that developed a unique sorting-search technology, revolutionizing the interaction between search engines and web/iPad users.

The technology dramatically improves the usability and effectiveness of the search results, it also saves the user time and effort.

Combining powerful text-analysis algorithms with a distinctive, intuitive, yet simple SUI (Search User Interface), SortFix helps searchers define an exact search query to get more accurate results.

SortFix SUI is rich in gestures that minimize keystrokes.

In addition, SortFix improves the results by analyzing relevant keywords within the search enginesâ€™ results and listing them as â€œPower Wordsâ€.

The “Power Wordsâ„¢â€ are extracted in real time, thus reinventing the search experience.

www.sortfix.com

firefox extension: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/sortfix-Extension/
